H0.text: Which is the largest island in Canada. Baffin Island

H1.text: Which is the largest island in Canada. Victoria Island

H2.text: Which is the largest island in Canada. Ellesmere Island

H3.text: Which is the largest island in Canada. ᕿᑭᖅᑖᓗᒃ

A4.text: Baffin Island (formerly Baffin Land) is the largest island in Canada.

A5.text: The Inuktitut name for Baffin Island is Qikiqtaaluk.

A7.text: It is the eighth-largest island in the world.

A8.text: Ellesmere Island is Canada's northernmost and third largest island, and the tenth largest in the world.

A9.text: Baffin Island (formerly Baffin Land), in the Canadian territory of Nunavut, is the largest island in Canada.

A10.text: Its area is 507,451 km2 (195,928 sq mi) (slightly smaller than Thailand).
